column1: Andwise "Andy" Roper was a Hobbits of the Shire.
Andwise was the son of Hobson
column2: an older brother of Gaffer Gamgee. Whereas his brother became a gardner
column3: Andwise inherited the family Wikipedia:ropewalk in Tighfield
column4: and continued the family trade. He left his ropewalk to his son Anson Roper after his death
